meaningMnemonic: We must <radical>stop</radical> the <radical>moon</radical>. That, at least, we can come to an <kanji>agreement</kanji> on.
readingMnemonic: "We have <kanji>agreement</kanji>," the world's leaders all say. "We will work together to stop the moon, and we have <kanji>agreement</kanji> on who we will follow, Emperor <reading>こう</reading>いち.
